titles.title: I see the lord, i see the lord

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I see the Lord, I see the Lord
He is high and lifted up and His train fills the temple (2)
The angels cry Holy, the angels cry Holy
The angels cry Holy is the Lord.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I hear the Lord, I hear the Lord
He is high and lifted up and His voice fills the temple

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
The angels cry Holy, the angels cry Holy
The angels cry Holy is the Lord.
